paragraphs: Check of Unknown to Abraham Lincoln, 12 February 1849 Pay to the order ofJoseph H. Berry, ofWinchester, Ills– Corcoran & Riggs No9891WashingtonFeb 121849 Pay toHon:A. Lincolnor order One Hundred & Five/100Dollars Bank of the State of MissouriSaint Louis Toppan, Carpenter & CoPhilad

footnotes.text: 1Abraham Lincoln wrote and signed this endorsement.
2Joseph H. Berry wrote and signed this endorsement.
3“Loker Renicke Co” and “Ellis & Maton” could not be positively identified.
